text: Baye wana bantoma baye Allah atondisaki bolamu naye likolo na bango kati ya libota ya Adam, na baye bazalaki elongo na Nûh (okati ya masuwa), mpe libota lia Ibrâhîm mpe Isalayele, mpe basusu baye tokambaki mpe toponaki, soki mikapo mia Ar-Rahmân mizali kotangama, bakweyaka na kofukama na kolela
